query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS authority_matrix_audit (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  decisionId VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL,
  changeType ENUM('ADD_ROLE', 'REMOVE_ROLE', 'MODIFY_DUAL_CONTROL', 'ADD_ESCALATION') NOT NULL,
  targetDecisionType VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL,
  previousValue TEXT,
  newValue TEXT,
  approvedBy VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL,
  secondApprover VARCHAR(256),
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

  targetDecisionType VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL,
  previousValue TEXT,
  newValue TEXT,
  approvedBy VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL,
  secondApprover VARCHAR(256),
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
